languages.text: "Ты очень кстати. Как там мой рекаф? Не люблю, когда он слишком горячий".
"Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."
languages.original_text: "Ты очень кстати. Как там мой рекаф? Не люблю, когда он слишком горячий".

traits.locale_text: "Just whom I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."
"Just whom I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."
"Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."
"Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."
"Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."
"Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."

languages.text: «Justo el hombre al que esperaba ver. ¿Cómo va mi café? No lo tomo demasiado caliente».
languages.original_text: "Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."

traits.locale_text: «Justo el hombre al que esperaba ver. ¿Cómo va mi café? No lo tomo demasiado caliente».

languages.text: “我正要找你呢。我的雷卡咖啡煮得怎么样了？我不喜欢弄得太烫。”
languages.original_text: "Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."

traits.locale_text: “我正要找你呢。我的雷卡咖啡煮得怎么样了？我不喜欢弄得太烫。”

languages.text: « Vous tombez bien, je vous cherchais. Alors, ce recaff, ça vient ? Pour votre gouverne, sachez que je l'aime pas trop chaud. »
languages.original_text: "Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."

traits.locale_text: « Vous tombez bien, je vous cherchais. Alors, ce recaff, ça vient ? Pour votre gouverne, sachez que je l'aime pas trop chaud. »

languages.text: 「会いたかったよ。模造コーヒーはどうだ？{mf|俺|私}は熱すぎるのが嫌いでね」
languages.original_text: "Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."

traits.locale_text: 「会いたかったよ。模造コーヒーはどうだ？{mf|俺|私}は熱すぎるのが嫌いでね」

languages.text: "Tam da görmek istediğim insan. Kahfem hazır mı? İçmeden önce biraz soğusun isterim."
languages.original_text: "Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."

traits.locale_text: "Tam da görmek istediğim insan. Kahfem hazır mı? İçmeden önce biraz soğusun isterim."

languages.text: "Genau der Mann, den ich sehen wollte. Wo bleibt mein Rekaf? Ich mag ihn nicht zu heiß."
languages.original_text: "Just the man I wanted to see. How is my recaf coming along? I do not like it too hot."

traits.locale_text: "Genau der Mann, den ich sehen wollte. Wo bleibt mein Rekaf? Ich mag ihn nicht zu heiß."
